name: Euro Freelancers
goal: Euro Freelancers is a curated marketplace for consulting and legal services on-demand. We enable organisations to find pre-screened freelance consultants and lawyers for project-based work related to EU policy and EU funding.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Entrepreneurship 2020 Action Plan
EU Single Market Strategy
EU Skills Agenda
Energy Services Directive
EU-Russia Partnership for Modernisation
EU Agenda on the Collaborative Economy
Crowdfunding Communication
European Pillar of Social Rights
EU Services Package
Regulation on promoting fairness and transparency for business users of online intermediation services
